WorkItem.ClosedComment:
I'm closing the issue, as this issue has been solved in MSDN, Developer's Guide to Microsoft Prism.

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
WorkItem.Description:
We found a possible mistake in Appendix E: Extending Prism from the Prism documentation. In the topic "Creating a Custom Region Adapter" (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg430866(v=PandP.40).aspx#sec24):
"...If you want to interact with the control that hosts the region, you should also implement IHostControlAwareBehavior."
However, in the Prism v4 library, we found that the interface described in this topic is called IHostAwareRegionBehavior, not IHostControlAwareBehaviour.
 
Regards,
 
Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
WorkItem.Summary: Possible mistake in documentation: Appendix E, Extending Prism
